com.sharethrough.sdk

Class BasicAdView

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • com.sharethrough.sdk.BasicAdView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdView

    public class BasicAdView
extends FrameLayout
implements IAdView
    This class implements IAdView and extends FrameLayout. This view contains everything needed to display a Sharethrough ad.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareWithResourceIds

        public void prepareWithResourceIds(int layoutResourceId,
                          int titleViewId,
                          int descriptionViewId,
                          int advertiserViewId,
                          int thumbnailViewId,
                          int optoutViewId,
                          int brandLogoId)
        This method passes in layouts and resource ids to be used during inflation and playing the BasicAdView into the view hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        layoutResourceId - The custom layout for Sharethrough's native ad unit.
        titleViewId - The view which will display the ad's title.
        descriptionViewId - The view which will display the ad's description. This field can be -1
        brandLogoId - The view which will display the brand logo (if available). This field can be -1
        advertiserViewId - The view which will display the ad's advertiser.
        thumbnailViewId - The view which will display the ad's thumbnail image.

      • getAdView

        public ViewGroup getAdView()
        Specified by:
        getAdView in interface IAdView
        Returns:
        The View containing the contents of the ad. Normally your IAdView implementation will be a subclass of ViewGroup and you should return this.
